title: This doesn't relate to LoL watsoever
body:
So if you were bothered enough to read the title, and u didn't, pls read it.

On to the subject:
(If you play) Tekken, it's an awesome game :D
Who's ur most favourite character to play?
And who is (u think) the most sexiest character?

My answers are:
Lee Chaolan
Lili

replies.body: any1 that can smash teemo in a beatdown :)
